author: smuzaffar
body:
In GCC 14 IBs we have over 4K [warnings](https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el8_amd64_gcc14/CMSSW_15_1_X_2025-02-18-2300/CondCore/AlignmentPlugins) like
```
   2170  casting 'boost::archive::class_id_type' to 'boost::uint_t<16>::least&' {aka 'short unsigned int&'} does not use 'boost::archive::class_id_type::operator base_type&()' [-Wcast-user-defined]
   2170  casting 'boost::archive::tracking_type' to 'boost::uint_t<8>::least&' {aka 'unsigned char&'} does not use 'boost::archive::tracking_type::operator bool&()' [-Wcast-user-defined]
```

Boost is patched to make class::base_type public. So this PR proposes to use that which will make sure that compiler calls the user defined conversion operator
title: [GCC14]Fix type conversion not using user defined operator warning
